reviewText: As a comaparison to First Descent, it does not have the big name snownoarders, but it does have more music, action, stunts and less commentary. Worth every penny.
My first snowboard dvd, but I will be loyal to Standard Films as much as possible. This dvd has a killer soundtrack! They did a great job on this on!
Standard films is really killing it. This film is incredible. Not quite Robot Food. but since Robot Food is gone, its the next best thing. Truely incredible.
